https://www.citybankplc.com/smart-ivr.General Information: City Bank brings to you Smart IVR visual response system. This all-new IVR system will enable you to complete your banking activities through the IVR menu on your mobile screen conveniently and safely. You can perform these activities without the help of any customer service representative.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. What is IVR?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- Interactive Voice Response (IVR) is an automated phone system technology that allows incoming callers to access information via a voice response system of prerecorded messages without having to speak to an agent.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Who is eligible for City Bank IVR services?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- Anyone can call at 16234 to get City bank IVR product services. To get account/credit card related services, caller should be City Bank registered customer.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. What is City Bank Call Center Magic Number?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- 16234 and +88028331040 (From abroad)

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. How many services have incorporated in the upcoming IVR services?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:-  There are 66 services have been incorporated in the upcoming IVR service. Major services are given below-

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. What is TPIN? What will be the Call Center registration process?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- “TPIN” meaning “Telephone Identification Number”.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Registration Process:
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: - Call @ 16234 from registered phone number > Language selection > Select 1 for TPIN generation, PIN generation & Card activation, and Card Lost Report/Replacement/New Card Request > TPIN generation > Enter Account/Card Number > Call will transfer at Call Center CSE end for further process.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Is it mandatory to generate TPIN to get IVR & SIVR services?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A. NO, it’s not mandatory.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. What kind of bill we can pay through IVR & SIVR?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- Only following bill can be payment through IVR & SIVR

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Credit Card bill
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: Utility bill               - DESCO (Postpaid) & WASA

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Utility bill
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: Internet bill           - Curnival

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Internet bill
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: Insurance              - Metlife

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Insurance
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: Tuition fee            - NSU (North South University)

Q. What is Smart IVR Service?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- Smart IVR is a support platform that guides inbound callers to a web-based support experience, as well as personalizing the support journey for customers to avoid the call queue. This technology seamlessly connects customers to self-service options which can meet their banking related query at first contact.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Who is eligible to get City Bank Smart IVR Link?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- All the registered/unregistered customers can get the City Bank Smart IVR Link. But unregistered customer can get the list of service & foreign exchange rate only. And all registered/unregistered customers need to call at 16234 from mobile number (local) for getting SIVR link.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Who is eligible for City Bank Smart IVR services?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- City Bank Retail & Credit Card members are eligible to get City Bank Smart IVR services through his/her registered mobile number.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. How to get City Bank Smart IVR link?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:-          Step 1: Call to 16234 and after language selection, need to select “2” for Smart IVR services.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: Step 2:  After select “2” for Smart IVR services, IVR will sent a short SIVR link to the customers calling number (Only mobile number).

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: Step 3: Now customer can view the smart IVR service main menu without any authentication.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: Q. Is City Bank Smart IVR link secure?

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Is City Bank Smart IVR link secure?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- Yes, banking through web-based support is safe moreover this link will generate dynamically with single session accessibility, because customer needs to call from registered contact number and in every validation steps the customer will need to input their Telephone Identification Number/ Personal Identification Number along with Account Number/Card Number. And for any transaction execution customer will need to authenticate the transaction through One Time Password (OTP).

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. How to check Account related services through City Bank Smart IVR?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- Customer need to input his/her account number and validate with TIN/PIN (telephone identification number/ personal identification number). After successful validation, system will appear following services

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Which debit card base will get service through City Bank Smart IVR?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- All types of debit card member will be able to get service through City Bank Smart IVR

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Which credit card base will get service through City Bank Smart IVR?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A:- All consumer credit card base will be able to access City Bank Smart IVR. However, CMs with following credit card status will not be able to get information by choosing different menu although they will be able to subscribe.

Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Question: Q. Is City Bank Smart IVR service accessible for both Primary & Supple CM?
Frequently Asked Question (FAQ).Answer: A: - Primary CM can check his/her card information along with supple if similar contact number tagged with both cards. However, Supplementary CM can access services through City Bank Smart IVR separately if different contact number has been tagged with his/her card.
